Pals.Name: Pikachu
Pals.Description: A small, yellow mouse Pokémon with electric cheeks.
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Pikachu is here, its tail crackling with electricity!

Pals.Name: Bulbasaur
Pals.Description: A seed Pokémon with a bulb on its back.
Pals.InitialDescription: Bulbasaur is here, looking ready to join a trainer!

Pals.Name: Pidgey
Pals.Description: A tiny bird Pokémon that is common in grassy areas.
Pals.InitialDescription: A Pidgey flutters nearby, pecking at the ground.
